CustomField.formula: IF( AND(SD_VP_STATIC__c = TRUE, OR(Job_Title__c = "Associate Consultant" ,Job_Title__c = "Associate Director" , Job_Title__c = "Director")), ((AO_Managing_Director_Value__c *0.45) + (BC_Managing_Director_Value__c * 0.10 ) + ( DC_Managing_Director_Value__c * 0.15) + ( Utilization_Rating__c * 0.30)), IF(AND(SD_VP_STATIC__c = TRUE, OR(Job_Title_Static__c = "Business Analyst", Job_Title_Static__c = "Executive Assistant")), (( AO_Managing_Director_Value__c *0.75) + (BC_Managing_Director_Value__c * 0.10 ) + ( DC_Managing_Director_Value__c * 0.15)), IF( AND(SD_VP_STATIC__c = TRUE, OR(Job_Title__c = "Senior Director", Job_Title__c = "Vice President")), (( AO_Managing_Director_Value__c *0.50) + (BC_Managing_Director_Value__c * 0.15 ) + ( DC_Managing_Director_Value__c * 0.15) + ( Utilization_Rating__c * 0.20)), 0.00)))
CustomField.label: Final Rating: MD
